channel.title: Linksys problem
channel.description:
Ok, i go onto mozilla firefox and I open up my web-browser, I type in 192.168.1.1 to get to my router I access it and port-forward fine. However when I try to use the internet afterwards it says unable to connect to server? Is there something I need to edit on my router to allow me to access the internet or what? Because when I try Port-forwarding on my 2Wire At&t modem the internet works fine but my server wont go up.... It used to work on my 2Wire but something messed up basiclly what im asking here is why cant I connect to the internet once ive set up my linksys?
Alot of things gone bad right now :\
